name: Brooke Vs. World Doom
description:
Fun Has Been Declared Illegal, and Brooke's Throwing a Party!


The evil council of corporations, Symmetry, have taken over Brooke Atomica's hometown, Hydro Rapids City. Late night pizza parties are a thing of the past. It's up to her to put in end to the council's harsh regulations before they bring extinction to all things fun!

Don't Fight Your Enemies, Obliterate Them


Put your platforming abilities to the ultimate test in jaw dropping, body shaking action! Keep your eyes out for cool stuff: Consume soda powerups to give a quick boost to Brooke's abilities. Collect wacky weapons to pack a punch with fun twists. While battling through levels, you'll find and earn diamonds for completing exciting level objectives. Crank up the difficulty to earn more diamonds!

What's On The Menu

Brooke Vs World Doom's all about blending challenging level design, fun weaponry, and exciting mechanics into an unforgettable meal:

  • 4 unique levels
  • 7 insane weapons
  • 6 powerups and items
  • Hardcore mode for extra insanity
  • Full controller support (with 360° aiming)
  • Full mouse + keyboard support
  • A soundtrack lead by music composer NitroSparxx

The Story of Corporate Rule


Symmetry embodies ultimate corporate greed. 5 major corporations have banded together to stomp on all things exciting. Symmetry has hired the Enforcers, their private mercenaries, to ensure their strict regulations are carried out by all citizens living in their territory. Currently, Hydro Rapids City and its city limits are under their control. Symmetry knew of the city’s previous difficulties with passing various laws and dealing with steadily increased crime rates, so they swooped in just in time with a deal that would hand the keys over to them and define the beginnings of a grime era.

The council, promising diminished problems and safer streets, instead served up a fresh plate of misery and boredom for all that live in the city. Their harsh restrictions make it difficult for the civilians to enjoy themselves. Ironically, crimes such as secret pizza parties and soda smuggling have skyrocketed, soaring higher than “real” crimes. With the city’s hopes dying day by day, local college athlete and party thrower Brooke Atomica plans to reignite her city’s flames with her awesome arsenal of crazy weapons and agile platforming. It’s up to her to bring down Symmetry’s devious plans to crush all things fun!
